alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:59PM MDT until July 20 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Box Elder County in northern Utah... * Until 645 PM MDT * At 558 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 25 miles north of Montello, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Etna. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 12 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
